name: Hazard 13
description:
A vertical slice of a shitty voip multiplayer game.
(Ensure you read the "Current Limitations" Paragraph)

HAZARD CLASS 13

In 2033 a new workplace hazard class was added to the existing physical and chemical threats. Hazard Class 13 was implemented to contain hazards from non-terrestrial biology, which were more dangerous and harder to contain. Positions in the cleanup and disposal of Class 13 Hazards were often exempt from the right to refuse due to a lack of effective containment protocols. It was a job no one wanted to take, but somebody has to do it, and everyone needs to earn a paycheck somehow.

Determine the species of the alien queen using the investigation tools and hunt it down with your friends in this co-op alien hunter.

CURRENT LIMITATIONS

Alien queen variants has not been fully implemented, ALL QUEENS ARE SPECIMEN A, MEANING THAT THEY CAN ONLY BE STUNNED USING THE FLAMETHROWER. The game is also missing an instruction screen (which will come with the variants) make sure that you USE THE CONTAINMENT TANKS TO BRING THE QUEEN BACK TO THE ENTRY ROOM.

FEEDBACK

This prototype is on itch.io for free temporarily to get feedback on the core mechanics and design of this game. I really value input on how to develop this further. So if you have any:
 > Ideas: ("It might be cool if...")
 > Comments: ("I didn't like how the aliens attacked immediately"/It took me a while to figure out...)
 > Bugs: (even if they look like they're obvious or temporary assets, sometimes I forget about them)
 > or Suggestions

Please let me know either in the comment section or in my discord here
https://discord.gg/3GEVcpbUjZ

JOINING DEVELOPMENT

I'm currently considering having some extra people join me in a Revshare capacity. So if you think that you fit an area I'm missing send me an email (applicationstation15@gmail.com) with the subject "Hazard Class Development" and maybe some of your work or whatever.


Controls

WASD - Move
F - Use
G - Drop
LMB - Fire/Use Tool
RMB - Secondary Tool
Space - Jump
MMB - Spectate
ESC - Bring up options menu

FAQ

I can't connect to my friend?
        I was too lazy to build matchmaking so you need to use https://www.noip.com/support/knowledgebase/general-port-forwarding-guide/
Where do I find my IP Address.
        Go to https://www.whatsmyip.org/ for a global connection or have your host type ipconfig into the command line.

What's the port number?
7777

Can I play this game without friends?

Yes, but it will be much harder and less fun, you might also need to lure the queen closer to the entry room before stunning her.
